name: Bayesian Optimization on Ackley Function
description: Optimize parameters to find the global minimum of the Ackley function. The Ackley function is a classic multimodal test problem that presents a nearly flat outer region and a sharp central valley, making it particularly challenging for optimization algorithms.
constraint: Parameters must be in [-32.768, 32.768] range. The global minimum is at the origin (0, 0, ..., 0).

target.name: Ackley Function Value
target.description: Minimize the Ackley function value. The global minimum is 0, achieved at the origin (0, 0, ..., 0). Typical values range from 0 to ~20.
